name: BigChadGuys
summary: BigChadGuys Plus Plus is a unique Cobblemon experience that blends the worlds of Minecraft and Pokemon. The mod pack offers a wide range of new content and features, including improved combat mechanics, revamped farming, new decoration blocks, and custom world generation with unique biomes, structures, and Pokemon. The mod pack also prioritizes performance improvements to ensure seamless gameplay. BigChadGuys Plus Plus is a must-try for players looking for a fresh and engaging experience.
